A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was so good. While the pacing felt off throughout\, all of the actors were pitch perfect. Johnson took risks (something I was beginning to think Hollywood as a collective whole were immune to) and most of them paid off. The sets were beautiful\, Rey and Kylo's story is far more interesting than anything that has come before it. Someone finally realized that Mark Hamill can do so much more than he's been allowed to as Luke. It is a lot to take in and that's what a middle sequel should be I think.
